title: Cosmology from Schwarzschild black hole revisited
authors: Roberto Casadio, Alexander Kamenshchik, Jorge Ovalle
abstract:
We study cosmological models based on the interior of the revisited
Schwarzschild black hole recently reported in [Phys.~Rev.~D{\bf 109} (2024)
104032]. We find that these solutions describe a non-trivial Kantowski-Sachs
universe, for which we provide an explicit analytical example with all the
details and describe some general features of the singularity.
